channel.title: Possible Easter Egg that I can't find again
channel.description:
So, in the canyon level of Surface Tension I came across a little hole in the cliff face when you take the alternative route down the cliff, as you could in the original. In the cliff there's a health pack, a couple of headcrabs spawn and there's a torch in the corner. Anyway, I recall as I walked in I was teleported and appeared next to a little shack on top of the cliff. There was a picnic bench outside, and inside there were various items on a workbench, a bed, and a notice board with some funny stuff pinned onto it such as a plan written up by Dr Breen with various grammatical errors, and it was a neat little find. However, when my friend replayed it the same thing didn't happen.
Does anyone have any idea what I did to make it happen?

item.title: Possible Easter Egg that I can't find again

item.description:
Tried again, after rereading the part about the button, worked perfectly. Also didnt mean to double post, hit wrong button once I finished my first message.

item.title: Possible Easter Egg that I can't find again
item.dc:creator: sourcegamer101
item.description:
Lost one:

fail troll is fail.

Nope, he is not trolling.

You have to go across the top area of the cliff face when you first go out of the pipe. You will see a small cliff room with a computer terminal, a Health Charger, and an H.E.V Charger in the same spot. You have to press a button on the computer terminal, then go back to where you came out of the sewer pipe, climb down a bit, then you’ll find this (sorry for the bugged out model lol), go into the little cave, and you will automatically teleport into here. It’s part of a ARG involving pizza.

Read full topic
